about_the_game:
Shadows in the dark is a short rogue-like game with frantic action, divided into four procedurally generated sectors.

✔ Choose the order you want to cycle through the sectors.

✔ Use your ability to transform into a shadow and the magical power to launch fireballs from your sword to defeat the horde of enemies that keep coming.

✔ Collect coins to improve your skills.
Collect all the diamonds scattered throughout the level, thus activating a magic statue that will allow you to complete the sector.

✔ Upon completing the four sectors, face the boss of this fantasy world.
